creditline: Gift of funds from Nancy and Rolf Engh
description: photomontage; black and white image of a standing woman wearing a winter coat and a wide-brimmed hat, with shoes with buckles, with her hands in her coat pockets; colorized image behind woman of a street with old cars at right, streetcar at left, and buildings; black border; red text to left and right of woman's head: "Main Street Winnipeg, Man, Canada"
title: Holding Her Ground
